name: Fonts
readme:
<$button class="tc-btn-invisible" style="overflow: hidden;white-space: pre;width: 100%;" message="tm-open-external-window" param="https://github.com/Telumire/Tiddlywiki-Fonts-Plugin">{{$:/core/images/github}} <$text text="https://github.com/Telumire/Tiddlywiki-Fonts-Plugin"/></$button>

<$button class="tc-btn-invisible" style="overflow: hidden;white-space: pre;width: 100%;" message="tm-open-external-window" param="https://fontmanager.tiddlyhost.com/">{{$:/core/images/home-button}} <$text text="https://fontmanager.tiddlyhost.com/"/></$button>


字体管理插件

''TL;DR''

Create categories in the font manager, set a css selector and a font to customize your wiki's fonts.
